Name: LocoMotives
About the game: Discover LocoMotives™ , the digital version of the Wild West strategy boardgame. LocoMotives™ is an epic game of town building, track laying and bandit fighting in the Wild West that is easy to learn. It’s like Ticket to Ride meets Settlers of Catan with all the crazy sights and explosive sounds of the Wild West. Play the free 1 player game online now. Look for LocoMotives™, the boardgame, on Kickstarter in the Fall of 2019. What you get in the full version of the game: • Single-player mode: play against 1 to 4 AI opponents. • Multiplayer mode: play with up to 4 players with hotseat mode • Tutorial to quickly familiarize you with the game. To find out more, visit: Languages available: English, French, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese
